reconcile_failures.help: Total failed reconcile operations performed on a specific cluster

reconcile_time_seconds.help: Length of time per reconcile for a specific cluster

reconcile_total.help: Total reconcile operations performed on a specific cluster

server_http_request_codes_total.help: Total HTTP requests to Couchbase Server for a specific cluster, method and status code returned

server_http_request_failures.help: Total failed HTTP requests to Couchbase Server for a specific cluster

server_http_requests_time_milliseconds.help: Length of time per request for a specific cluster

server_http_requests_total.help: Total HTTP requests to Couchbase Server for a specific cluster
